metadata.name: Explorer NOUACCHECK Flag
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious starts of explorer.exe that use the /NOUACCHECK flag that allows to run all sub processes of that newly started explorer.exe without any UAC checks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/nouaccheck')) AND NOT (lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s schedule') AND lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\svchost.exe')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious starts of explorer.exe that use the /NOUACCHECK flag that allows to run all sub processes of that newly started explorer.exe without any UAC checks

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Domain Controller User Logon 2. Unknown how many legitimate software products use that method Reference: https://twitter.com/ORCA6665/status/1496478087244095491
